title: What is the history of US artillery? - Quora

response.answer_text: The US Army’s artillery formation has been around since the days of the continental Army, and the war of independence. It has undergone substantial changes since, but it’s core mission remains the same, to provide fire support to the infantry from a safe position, hence, the moniker “King of the Battlefield”
Field Artillery Catalog Record: King of battle : a branch history of the U.S.... Both are slightly out of date but detail the history of the Army branch known as Field Artillery.
